alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 2:25AM MST until February 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, 1 to 3 inches of snow expected. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 AM MST early this morning. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains
